title: New: Finite – Infinity Falling
content:
So many people underestimate the effect that Casiotone For The Painfully Alone has had on modern music.

Delaware’s Finite draws from CFTPA on his debut track, Infinity Falling, alongside more recent influences, such as Baths or Majical Cloudz, through the minimal nature of the track and half muttered, half whispered vocals. Alongside the beautiful artwork, Infinity Falling is a mightily impressive first move.

segments of scenes and noise disrupt the void  / pieces are now in place / show me what I’m falling toward
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
